about_the_game:
Suit up and become the manager of one of the 2 000+ professional teams around the world. You’ll have all the managerial tools you’ve come to expect in a manager game, scouting, facilities, training or basketball plays on the court. Your choices matter, will you put emphasis on coaching or player development? Success is only the result of your decisions both on and off the court.

You can choose from 90 domestic leagues, including 17 women’s leagues, from 60 different countries across Europe, America, Asia and Oceania. With more than 2 000 teams and 60 000 players, the world of basketball awaits you.

International basketball is both exciting and competitive! PBM25 features most major international competitions, and your coaching skills might lead you to coach a national team. Will you have what it takes to take a gold medal home?

Pro Basketball Manager 25 is the only simulation videogame on the market featuring more than 20 official licenses recognised worldwide, such as the Betclic Élite, Türkiye Sigorta Basketbol Süper Ligi, Betsafe-LKL, BNXT, Kooperativa NBL and many others.

LICENSES

The following leagues are officially licensed in PBM2025 with official names and photos of their players and teams:

NEW FEATURES

  • All competitions, teams and players have been updated for the 24/25 season.

  • More than 20 licensed leagues from top professional leagues in Europe, Oceania and Latin America.

  • A refined and powerful editor that allows you to modify players, teams and even create competitions!

  • The game now features 3D facilities management. For the first time in the history of PBM you’ll be able to choose between 13 different buildings to increase your income, improve your youth academy or training centre and much more.

  • In Pro Basketball Manager 2025, you now have full control over your team’s budget, which will be influenced by the sponsors you choose. At the start of each season, you’ll receive sponsor offers based on your team’s performance and reputation within your league. Sponsors will give you objectives that can further increase your income if you fulfil them. But choose wisely, as bad results could impact your budget negatively.

  • For the first time ever simulated and played games share the same algorithm. It now means that the same results will be obtained whether the game is simulated or played (if not coaching). It will also streamline the tactics and results for games.

  • We’ve added shooting charts to the game. You can now analyze where each shot has been taken during the games, if your players are scoring a lot on turnovers or fastbreaks.

  • We’ve also added another analytical tool with the new score evolution graph. You can just look at the score evolution right after each game to see where the momentum swing was.

  • Where are your players most efficient? Just check the new zone charts for each individual player! This third new analytical tool will give more information on player performance.

  • Prize money has been added to the game. You can now earn money when you do well in a competition. Another way to increase your budget!

  • PBM25 will feature a new search popup, just click on the magnifying class and you can search for any player/team/competition/staff member from the game.

FEATURES

  • PBM25 lets you create your own plays that you can then call during the games to take your opponent off-guard.

  • Be it individual players or teams, you have a whole range of statistics at your fingertips which allow you to manage your progress. You can thus check on your players’ performances (past and present), evaluate your own career, or even look back through the archives of the games of any team featured in PBM25.

  • Through our in-depth scouting system, you can send your scouts around the world to be on the lookout for the next best players to make it to the top.

  • Train your players collectively, but also individually to get the best results. Improve your club's finances by improving your facilities to generate extra revenue.

  • You can sign, loan or transfer players. Mistakes can happen and you can also fire players to adapt your squad to your needs.

  • You can choose to play the games in 3D and follow the on-court action, making tactical changes on the fly and assigning your own plays to a player. You can also use the 2D or text mode if you prefer.

  • If you cannot wait any longer for the result, you can skip a quarter or even the entire game for an immediate result.

PLAYABLE LEAGUES

America:

2 continental competitions

Argentina (1 men's league), Brazil (1 men's league), Canada (1 men's league), Chile (1 men's league), Colombia (1 men's league), Dominican Republic (1 men's league), Mexico (1 men's league), Panama (1 men's league), Puerto Rico (1 men's league), Uruguay (1 men's league), USA (1 men's league), Venezuela (1 men's league)

Asia:

1 continental competition

China (1 men's league), Chinese Taipei (1 men's league), Japan (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Philippines (1 men's league), South Korea (1 men's league)

Europe:

7 continental competitions

Albania (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Austria (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 2 national cup), Belarus (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Belgium (1 national cup), Belgium,Netherlands (1 men's league), Bosnia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Bulgaria (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Croatia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Cyprus (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 2 national cups), Czech Republic (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Denmark (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Estonia,Latvia (1 men's league), Finland (1 men's league, 1 national cup), France (4 men's leagues, 2 women's leagues, 3 national cups), Georgia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Germany (3 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Greece (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Hungary (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Iceland (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Israel (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Italy (3 men's leagues, 2 women's leagues, 6 national cups), Kosovo (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Lithuania (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Latvia,Lithuania (1 women's league), Luxembourg (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Macedonia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Montenegro (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Netherlands (1 national cup), Norway (1 men's league, 1 women's league), Poland (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Portugal (1 men's league, 1 (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Turkey (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 2 national cups), Ukraine (1 men's league, 1 national cup), United Kingdom (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Croatia,Bulgaria,Slovenia,Bosnia,Serbia,Montenegro (1 women's league)

Oceania:

Australia (1 men's league), New Zealand (1 men's league)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, or Intel x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, or Intel x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2025

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Suit up and become the manager of a basketball team. You’ll have all the managerial tools you’ve come to expect in a manager game, scouting, facilities, training and more. Will you put emphasis on coaching or player development? Success is only the result of your decisions both on and off the court.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Greek, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Polish
